title: Pro Bowling 3D
description: A realistic 3D bowling simulation built with Babylon.js. Experience the physics and strategy of bowling with detailed graphics and accurate ball movement. Features multiple lanes, ball customization, and realistic pin physics that create an authentic bowling experience in your browser.
how_to_play: Click and drag to set the direction and power of your throw. Release to bowl. Adjust your position on the lane by clicking the arrows before bowling. Aim for strikes by hitting the pins at the right angle and with appropriate power. Play through a full 10-frame game, trying to achieve the highest possible score.
